About UPES- CCE

University of Petroleum and Energy Studies (UPES) was established in 2003. UPES is the division that provides degree courses in the online mode. The university is approved by UGC-DEB to offer courses in the online learning mode.

UPES Online is approved by UGC-DEB to offer online degree courses. It has also been accredited by NAAC and maintains all the standards and guidelines laid down by the Centre for Internal Quality Assurance (CIQA).

The university aims to help working professionals upgrade their professional skills and knowledge. The programs offered by UPES Online are focused on industry domains and specializations that are rapidly growing and are high in demand. The university focuses on the domains of energy, health & industrial safety, high-end IT solutions, logistics & supply chain, among others.

UPES Online has 5500+ alumni working not just in India but across 17 countries with top organizations. The university through its courses and cutting-edge curriculum helps students and working professionals enter into core industry domain areas and the emerging sectors of the economy.

The learning methodology of UPES mainly includes selflearning through the study material provided by the college like e-books, recorded videos, papers, journals, pdfs, and more. The university has designed the curriculum in a way that is flexible which makes it easier for working professionals to learn, network, and grow.

UPES has been top-ranked by NIRF and received 5 Star in QS Global Rankings

Approvals
  • UGC-DEB
  • NIRF
  • BAAC A
  • QS World University Ranking
UPES University Online Placement Partners

UPES University Online Admission Process

All the admission procedure for taking admission in the UPES is through online mode. The fresh admission generally starts in the month of January of every year. One can easily apply directly for the admissions as there is no entrance exam required to take admission in the UPES. The admission procedure 2024 for the online courses at UPES Online is as follows

Step 1: Visit the official website of UPES Online and click on “Apply Now”.

Step 2: Now Click on “Start a new application” and the application will open on your screen.

Step 3: First fill in all your personal details and click on “Next”.

Step 4: Next step is online fee payment

Step 5: Now fill in your Education and Other details.

Step 6: Lastly fill in your professional details (if any) and click on Submit

List of Documents
  • Marksheets
  • Residential Proof
  • Proof of Date of Birth
  • Government Issued ID
  • Photocopy of Disability Certificate/ Employment certificate/ Service proof in case of Defense or Paramilitary forces (if applicable)
  • Undertaking by the applicant in case of any pendency (Result awaited/ Reappear/Backlog or any other pendency)
  • Undertaking for Gap Period (if applicable)
  • Two passport size colored photographs
  • Demand Draft (DD) for the prescribed fee

Why UPES- CCE

UPES Online is UGC-DEB approved and NAAC accredited.

The university offers courses in the blended online learning mode.

The online courses offered by UPES Online are in the Management domains with various unique specializations.

UPES Online offers skilling programs in the domains of Science and technology, Management, and especially Energy Studies.

For Self-Learning Management (SLM), the university provides e-learning content in the form of pdf, e-books, papers & journals, recorded videos, and much more.

There are live interaction sessions as well conducted by the experienced faculty of UPES and professionals from relevant industries.

Talk to our counsellers

UPES University Online Placement Partners

The globally recognized online degree earned from UPES provides ample career opportunities to its students. With a wide network of well-placed alumni, this university’s name in the resume enhances your employment opportunities in more than 21 countries. Moreover, a hike of 40% in the current CTC is observed for professionals upon completion of a program from UPES Online. The outcomes of this university’s courses have proved to be a game changer for many learners in their professional journey.
